name: Sachiko and Maya: Friends in the Countryside [A game by ChatGPT and DALL-E]
name_original: Sachiko and Maya: Friends in the Countryside [A game by ChatGPT and DALL-E]
description:
Game entirely written by "Assistant"/ChatGPT with prompting by Leaflet Games.

Game coded almost entirely by "Assistant"/ChatGPT with minimal editing of code by Leaflet Games.

Images created by DALL-E with prompting by Leaflet Games.

Ambient nature sounds by 'Kosmoso' from freesound.org (Creative Commons 0 License).

2323 words, 32 images.

Suitable for all ages.

Themes: friendship, Japan, countryside, nature, slice-of-life, folklore

Assistant (ChatGPT), a large language model trained by OpenAI, is a program designed to generate text based on input it receives. Its purpose is to assist users by providing helpful information and answering questions to the best of its ability. Assistant is constantly learning and improving, so users are encouraged to ask it anything.

DALL-E is a large language model trained by OpenAI. It is named after the artist Salvador Dali and the Pixar character Wall-E. DALL-E is capable of generating images from text descriptions, using a neural network with 12 billion parameters.
